remarks: Closure of the ordering in a binary structure product.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Aug-2015.)
statement:
xpsle.t $e |- T = ( R Xs. S ) $.
xpsle.x $e |- X = ( Base ` R ) $.
xpsle.y $e |- Y = ( Base ` S ) $.
xpsle.1 $e |- ( ph -> R e. V ) $.
xpsle.2 $e |- ( ph -> S e. W ) $.
xpsle.p $e |- .<_ = ( le ` T ) $.
xpsless $p |- ( ph -> .<_ C_ ( ( X X. Y ) X. ( X X. Y ) ) ) $.
